attributes.action: Home care workers to be paid hourly rate NOT by clients
attributes.additional_details: To give home care workers equally pay the same as all other industries
attributes.background: Home care workers should be paid by hour like all other jobs and not per client.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for the pay of non-public sector workers, beyond setting the national minimum wage.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum wage for social care staff to £10.72: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316909

Raise the minimum wage for Domiciliary Care Workers to £12 per hour immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314394
